name: Space Orbit
description:
Your home planet is dying - can you venture into the dangers of space and collect the resources required to save it?

Space Orbit is a top-down space game where you control a ship flying in and out of different planetal orbits. Your goal is to find, collect and bring back resources from other planets so that your home planet can be saved. Just be careful so that you dont run out of fuel or crash into any dangerous debris!

Controls:

  • W - accelerate
  • S - break
  • AD - steer left and right

Credits:

  • Douglas Driving - Design & Programming
  • Oscar Wirdelius - Sound & Programming
  • Guldfisk - Programming
  • Anonymous - Art

Created in 72h as an entry to the gamejam "Ludum Dare 47" following the theme "stuck in a loop".
